1.Pros: Good first job for a young student

2.Pros: One free employee meal for each day you work, two days off a week
2.Cons: Never had the tools required to do our jobs correctly, never had enough time or people to do our jobs correctly, managements idea of 'managing' was to stand over us and scream and threaten us, there was literally no training, managers often had us lie during inspections about how we do things in the store, lots and lots of drama - mostly between managers

3.Pros: Free foodGood PayManagers are nice most of the times
3.Cons: Managers are very rude a few times

6.Pros: Amazing company. Great benifits. Love McD’s.
6.Cons: None. Everything is amazing at this place.

7.Pros: Flexible Schedule, management is good working around busy schedules, giving time off.
7.Cons: Fast food atmosphere, not always treated respectfully by management, hours/schedules range all over. less hours in summer due to high school kids/ being overscheduled/ overstaffed.

8.Pros: good coworkers. get to meet new people.
